Description: Lower body sherd of Chian, possibly Mature Animal Style, Grand or Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed black with two added white bands above rosette with alternating added red and white petals; exterior: reserved, where not eroded, with two streaky brown bands.
Curator's comments: The exterior and interior decoration are consistent with the Mature Animal Style, Grand and Simple Animal Style.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0685) (phase 2)
